column4: i tried the first line and got this "E: Couldn't find package linux-ubuntu-modules-2.6.27-7-generic
uhh.. im kind of a noob. how do i know if im using ibex? i have 8.10 x64 installed
ibex intrepid = 8.10
any advice on how to proceed?
ok
hey i ran alsamixergui
what should i do from there?
does the soundcard appear in  the upper panel of alsa-gui ?
no
but the first line of your instructions didnt work.. didnt find ubuntu-modules for my kernel
alsamixergui starts up, but can't see your soundcard in the right upper corner ?
yep
it says pulseaudio for card and chip
i have set everything to alsa and tried other combinations. none of them are producing any sounds :S
yes i checked in alsa mixer
..sorry to bother you but have you got any ideas?
alsamixer -Dhw
i checked. none of them are muted
except digital output which i set to "off"
you think this problem is a lost cause or do you think there is still a way to fix it?
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/163560      , make sure its an audigy2 (maybe look into case)
